summary: Simple mod that changes the destruction perks from halving the costs to doubling the damage. Other options also available.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]About this Mod[/size][/center]

This mod changes the Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, and Master destruction perks. The goal is to make destruction more powerful. Right now there are three options to choose from:

Option A gets rid of cost reduction and instead gives a 100% damage bonus to spells of that rank.

Option B keeps the 50% cost reduction and adds a 50% damage bonus to spells of that rank.

Option C makes each perk give 10% cost reduction and 10% damage bonus to all destruction spells. Having novice through master in option B is identical to having novice through master in option B.

[size=4][center]Compatibility[/size][/center]

Usable with or without DLC. In theory, you could use my mod alongside another perk overhaul if you put mine lower in the load order but this is not recommended. Any spell mod that would've been compatible with the vanilla perks will be compatible with this mod.

[size=4][center]Installation[/center][/size]
Easy NMM install. For manual installation, extract "BetterDestructionPerks.esp" into the Skyrim/data folder and activate it. This mod only edits vanilla perks so it is safe to install and uninstall even if you have already invested in the destruction tree.
